The Kettle-Mate: This is an electric kettle with a built-in AI assistant that can learn your preferred brewing settings and preferences over time. It can also make recommendations for different types of tea or coffee based on your past choices, making it a personalized brewing companion.

Kettle-Vision: This electric kettle comes with a built-in camera and display, allowing you to see the water inside the kettle at all times. It also includes a smartphone app that allows you to remotely monitor the water level and temperature, ensuring that your beverage is always at the perfect temperature.

Kettle-Mood: This electric kettle is designed with a built-in mood lighting system that changes color based on the temperature of the water inside. The kettle can also recognize different types of music and adjust the lighting accordingly, creating a unique and personalized brewing experience.

Kettle-Clean: This electric kettle comes with a built-in water purification system, ensuring that the water you use to brew your beverage is always clean and safe to drink. The kettle can also clean itself, making it easy to maintain and keep hygienic.

Kettle-Connect: This electric kettle is designed to connect with other smart devices in your home, such as your coffee maker or toaster. It can automatically adjust the brewing temperature and time based on the type of beverage you are brewing, ensuring that your coffee or tea is always perfectly brewed.
